lead_paragraph: BINKERD--Joan Dunbar. Died peacefully July 18, 2016. Born April 8, 1920, Buffalo, NY. Beloved of family and friends. Predeceased by husband, Alfred Alan, survived by her five children, seven grandchildren, eight great- grandchildren. Service to follow in Spring 2017. Donations to Christ Church Choirs or Bruce Museum, Greenwich, CT. www.horizon funerals.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BINKERD, JOAN DUNBAR
